metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5221 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in the mif_process_cmpt function in libjasper/mif/mif_cod.c in the JasPer JPEG-2000 library before 1.900.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted JPEG 2000 image file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5221` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjasper-runtime - 1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1.2
libjasper1 - 1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jasper package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1.2').
